articles.title: David Teeger: Axing of South Africa U19 cricket captain sparks antisemitism row
articles.description: Cricket South Africa officials say they demoted David Teeger because of safety concerns after his comments about the Gaza conflict.
articles.content:
Cricket South Africa (CSA) has said it has dropped David Teeger as captain of its Under-19 side because of security concerns following comments he made about the ongoing conflict in Gaza.
But Jewish… [+3006 chars]

articles.title: Warner takes helicopter to SCG for Big Bash match
articles.description: David Warner flew by helicopter and landed in the middle of the Sydney Cricket Ground as he dashed from his brother's wedding to play in the Big Bash for the Sydney Thunder.
articles.content:
David Warner will make three appearances for Sydney Thunder this season

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
